tasks.label: Build knpl-influencer-web
tasks.command: if [ ! -f ${workspaceFolder}/knpl-influencer-web/knpl-influencer-web-approuter/node_modules/@sap/html5-repo-mock/index.js ] || [ ! -f ${workspaceFolder}/knpl-influencer-web/knpl-influencer-web-approuter/node_modules/@sap/approuter/approuter.js ]; then npm i @sap/approuter && npm i @sap/html5-repo-mock; fi
